Abstract: Carl S. Kaplan is a New York-based lawyer and journalist. His news background includes stints at The Nation as an editorial intern, The New Leader as associate editor, CES Publishing as editor and writer, and New York Newsday as a business reporter. His freelance articles have appeared in many publications.
